mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_T ( FREE_NO , EMAIL , CONTENTS , CREATED_AT , STATUS , DEPTH , GROUP_NO , GROUP_ORDER ) VALUES ( FREE_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{email} , #{contents} , SYSTIMESTAMP , 1 , 0 , FREE_SEQ.CURRVAL , 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT FREE_NO, EMAIL, CONTENTS, CREATED_AT, STATUS, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, GROUP_ORDER FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, GROUP_ORDER ASC) AS RN, FREE_NO, EMAIL, CONTENTS, CREATED_AT, STATUS, DEPTH, GROUP_NO, GROUP_ORDER FROM FREE_T) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
